results.title: MicroRNAs modulation and clinical outcomes at 1 year of follow-up in obese patients with pre-diabetes treated with metformin vs. placebo.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: In @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ pre-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetics@@@', @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly reduces @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@/oxidative stress, and @GENE_MIR195 @GENE_406971 @@@miR-195@@@ and @GENE_MIR27A @GENE_407018 @@@miR-27@@@, with reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Megalencephalic_leukoencephalopathy_with_subcortical_cysts</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536141 @@@LVM@@@, IMT.

citations.NLM: Sardu C, Trotta MC, Pieretti G, Gatta G, Ferraro G, Nicoletti GF, D' Onofrio N, Balestrieri ML, D' Amico M, Abbatecola A, Ferraraccio F, Panarese I, Paolisso G, Marfella R. MicroRNAs modulation and clinical outcomes at 1 year of follow-up in obese patients with pre-diabetes treated with metformin vs. placebo. Acta Diabetol. 2021 Oct;58(10):1381-1393. PMID: 34009437
citations.BibTeX: @article{34009437, title={MicroRNAs modulation and clinical outcomes at 1 year of follow-up in obese patients with pre-diabetes treated with metformin vs. placebo.}, author={Sardu C and Trotta MC and Pieretti G and Gatta G and Ferraro G and Nicoletti GF and D' Onofrio N and Balestrieri ML and D' Amico M and Abbatecola A and Ferraraccio F and Panarese I and Paolisso G and Marfella R}, journal={Acta Diabetol}, volume={58}, number={10}, pages={1381-1393}}

results.title: A randomized controlled trial of metformin on left ventricular hypertrophy in patients with coronary artery disease without diabetes: the MET-REMODEL trial
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment significantly reduced @<m>DISEASE_Megalencephalic_leukoencephalopathy_with_subcortical_cysts</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536141 @@@LVM@@@ (change in @<m>DISEASE_Megalencephalic_leukoencephalopathy_with_subcortical_cysts</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536141 @@@LVM@@@: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group -6.53 +- 5.59 g vs. placebo group -3.23 +- 6.32 g; P = 0.032) in the mITT analysis, leading to an absolute mean difference of -3.3 (95% confidence interval: -6.32 to -0.29) (Table 2 and Figure 2).

citations.NLM: Mohan M, Al-Talabany S, McKinnie A, Mordi IR, Singh JSS, Gandy SJ, Baig F, Hussain MS, Bhalraam U, Khan F, Choy AM, Matthew S, Houston JG, Struthers AD, George J, Lang CC. A randomized controlled trial of metformin on left ventricular hypertrophy in patients with coronary artery disease without diabetes: the MET-REMODEL trial Eur Heart J. 2019 Nov 1;40(41):3409-3417. PMID: 30993313
